descriptionHtml:
This mod changes Cicero\'s clothes to a nice soothing black. This also affects any other Jester clothes. 

If you are using one of the fine mods that improve the textures on armour and clothes, you will have to overwrite those to use these (though it will only effect the Jester clothes). 

Enjoy.

 - Installation Instructions - 
Extract the \'textures\' folder from the archive using WinRAR or 7Zip, and place it in your Skyrim\\Data folder. Overwrite if prompted. 

 - Incompatibilities - 
Anything that changes the Jester clothes. 

 - Tools - 
Fallout Mod Manager to extract the textures from the BSA.
GIMP + plus DDS plugin to modify the DDS. 
WinRAR to create the archive.
author: Glexn
